text:
@GovernorVA @GovernorVA and @VDHgov you have a better way to share the updated requirements than by viewing a video on an unstable app and capturing screenshots?

Are the slides or policies available somewhere on https://t.co/6OoazAHi6O or https://t.co/wBT2PXwym8 ? https://t.co/9cYl3fjMn8
